DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate if the patient was reported lost to follow-up.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A short textual account; having provided a short account._The loss or lack of continuation of follow-up after a study has officially closed.  See Follow-up.
